mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Ann Pamela Cunningham to Nancy Halsted, 1870 December 13
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cunningham, Ann Pamela, 1816-1875
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Ann Pamela Cunningham to Nancy Halsted, Vice Regent for New Jersey, December 13, 1870. Rosemont. She is pleased with Mr. G's work on cistern - plans to extend pipes to vegetable garden and stables. Fears hydraulic ram may not be powerful enough. Funds low, gate receipts not good. No postmaster in her region. Letters carried by farmers. Uncertainty and delay of mails.
